ComicInfo.Title: Anybody Here Know a Guy Named Meteor Man?
ComicInfo.Summary: Anybody Here Know a Guy Named Meteor Man?: Nighthawk is attacked by Meteor Man. Nighthawk teams up with Spider-Man but once he learns the history of Meteor Man he decides he doesn't want to help capture him.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:42:47. [Issue ID 28575]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Spider-Man [Peter Parker],Warden Ivan Carmichael,Nighthawk [Kyle Richmond],Bill Gordon (in flashback),Jeremiah,Meteor Man [Norton G. Fester, formerly The Looter]
ComicInfo.Tags: Spider-Man [Peter Parker],Warden Ivan Carmichael,Nighthawk [Kyle Richmond],Bill Gordon (in flashback),Meteor Man [Norton G. Fester,formerly The Looter],Jeremiah
